descriptions.item2: Group project submission for Condor Hacks Hackathon 2021
descriptions.item3: Project aims to help users track their food in order to reduce food waste and save money
descriptions.item4: Responsible for backend implementation and connecting with Firebase realtime database
descriptions.item5: Responsible for deploying to Google Play Store

descriptions.item1: Group project submission for Geekfest Hackathon 2021
descriptions.item2: Project aims to gamify carbon footprint tracking to encourage users to make sustainable choices
descriptions.item3: Responsible for coordinating team, teaching MVC design pattern and GitHub version control
descriptions.item4: Created JavaScript functions to control menu interface
descriptions.item5: Presented completed prototype through two rounds of judging

descriptions.item1: Individual submission for Google Developer Student Club's Demo Day Competition 2021
descriptions.item2: A quiz program for students to practice for tests and exams
descriptions.item3: Points are timer based, with players and scores tracked to show a leaderboard
descriptions.item4: Server hosted on MS Azure, using a MySQL database

descriptions.item1: An auction sales site similar to eBay or kijiji
descriptions.item2: Users can create an account to post items for sale, as well as bid on items already listed

descriptions.item1: Single Page Application to highlight relevant projects
descriptions.item2: Utilizes JavaScript fetch method for dynamic loading of project data
descriptions.item3: Supports dynamic dark/light theme on load
descriptions.item4: Front-end created with only HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript ES6
